summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account balance and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's Caterpillar Trust for the month of July 2018. It includes information on deposits, interest payments, and service charges, highlighting the significant balance in the account.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder of the Caterpillar Trust at Deutsche Bank, with significant financial transactions recorded in the statement.

events.title: Monthly Account Summary
events.description: Summary of account transactions and balance for Jeffrey Epstein's Caterpillar Trust for July 2018.

keyFacts: The account balance for the Caterpillar Trust as of July 31, 2018, was $13,527,405.05.
An interest payment of $20,500.90 was credited to the account on July 31, 2018.
The document indicates that the account is not FDIC insured and is subject to the German Deposit Guarantee Act.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees recorded for this statement period.
The document includes instructions for disputing errors on the account statement.
